title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\EvaluationConfig
name: EvaluationConfig
description:
Configuration details used for calculating evaluation metrics and creating an [Evaluation][google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.Evaluation].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.EvaluationConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.bounding_box_evaluation_options
params.description: Only specify this field if the related model performs image object detection (IMAGE_BOUNDING_BOX_ANNOTATION). Describes how to evaluate bounding boxes.
